description: [``botocore``] adds support for multiple new composition layout configuration options (grid, pip)
[``botocore``] Support new RuntimeEnvironmentUpdate parameter within UpdateApplication API allowing callers to change the Flink version upon which their application runs.
[``botocore``] This release makes the default option for S3 on Outposts request signing to use the SigV4A algorithm when using AWS Common Runtime (CRT).
